// src/About.js import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function About() {   const navigate = useNavigate();   return (    
     
       

Cloud Native IoT Device Management

       

Mini Project by CSE - Q Team 7, Anurag University

     
     
       

About the Project

       

          This project showcases a modern, cloud-native solution for managing and monitoring Internet of Things (IoT) devices in real-time.           Designed by the CSE - Q team of Anurag University, it demonstrates seamless integration between a device simulator, backend APIs,           and an interactive web dashboard.        

     
     
       

Team Contribution

       

          We applied cloud computing, microservices, and MQTT protocols. Our project reflects both technical capability and teamwork.        

     
     
       

🔑 Key Highlights:

       
             
  • 🌐 Cloud-Native with Docker Support
    •          
  • 📡 Real-Time IoT Device Simulation (MQTT)
    •          
  • 📊 Live Dashboard with Charts
    •          
  • 🧠 Scalable, Modular Codebase
    •          
  • 🏫 Tailored for Anurag University
    •        
     
     
       

Submitted by: CSE - Q Team 7, Anurag University

     
         
  ); }
